# Survival Analysis

# Load Library

```{r}
library(survival)
library(gtsummary)
library(survminer)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(lubridate)
library(haven)
library(dplyr)
library(corrplot)
library(mfp)
```

## Read Data

```{r}
stroke <- read_dta ("stroke_outcome.dta")
```

```{r}
summary(stroke)
```

```{r}
stroke <- stroke %>%
  mutate_if(is.labelled,~as_factor(.))
```

```{r}
summary(stroke)
```

```{r}
stroke <- stroke %>%
  mutate(dur=stroke$doa %--% stroke$dod) %>%
           mutate(dur=as.duration(dur)) %>%
  mutate(dur_days = dur/ddays (1))

```

```{r}
stroke <- stroke %>% 
  mutate(category=cut(stroke$sbp, c (0,140,160,300), label = c('normal', 'hpt1','hpt2')))
  
```
